attributes.title: This app is so bad!!!
attributes.review: Not only is this an app biased based on the news for Trump, and he is trying to make his image more appealing to the general public, if this was really a news app they would have news coming from all different sources to emphasize on the good and the bad from this country

attributes.title: Absolutely terrible
attributes.review: The app took about two days to download and when it finally did hacked my phone and started sending me ridiculously racist and homophobic notifications. 10/10 do not recommend downloading this app if you are a decent human being.

attributes.title: worst app ever
attributes.review: This is by far the worst thing i have downloaded it took 40 weeks to download and when i opened the app there was a extremely ugly orange i turned my phone off but after that the orange was in my kitchen it burned my house and now im homeless worst app ever i do not recommend it at all

attributes.title: Terrible and really worse!!

attributes.title: Worst app, needs to be taken down
attributes.review: The fitness gram pacer will begin in 30 minutes, line up at the start. When you hear the noise *beep* run to the other side in a straight line. Each round will get faster everytime you hear the sound *beep* to begin, lineup at the start.

attributes.title: TERRIBLE
attributes.review: this app took up SO much storage. then every time I tried to open it, it shut down my entire phone and I had to wait for it to come back on. my phone has been very slow since downloading and still is after deleting.

attributes.title: THEY ARE TRACKING ME
attributes.review: This app is horrible. It took several days to download and I have a very expensive WiFi plan. And it works very VERY slow. Not only that but when I put my info in to log in it took my information and now I‚Äôm being tracked by the government. And they came to my house.

attributes.title: Contemplating suicide after downloading
